General.Name: Jiangsu WELLE Environmental Co Ltd
General.Description: Welle Environmental Group Co., Ltd. provides urban environmental management, agriculture and rural environmental management, and industrial energy savings and environmental protection services in the People's Republic of China. It offers waste leachate treatment, food and kitchen waste treatment, river remediation, and municipal sewage treatment services; agricultural organic waste utilization and rural domestic sewage treatment services; and industrial flue gas treatment, VOC recovery, industrial waste utilization, and industrial wastewater treatment services. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu WELLE Environmental Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Welle Environmental Group Co., Ltd. in March 2019. Welle Environmental Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Changzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 156, Hanjiang West Road, Changzhou, China, 213125
